Callback14Header: Deliver the Stolen Idol to Timue
Callback23Header: Give Timue the Marsh Snake Venom
Name: Growing Reminders
Phase0Description: Kres wants to return an object he stole, but he is having trouble remembering who it belonged to. If we talk, maybe I can help him remember.
Phase10Description: Kres wants to return an object he stole, but he is having trouble remembering who it belonged to. If we talk, maybe I can help him remember.
Kres remembered ot: :  he stole from was Timue. I should return the item to her.
Phase18Description: Having returned the item, Timue offered to create a salve to help Kres. I need to collect the venom of marsh snakes.
Phase21Description: With Timue's salve, I should return to Kres. He will want to know about Timue's reaction.
Phase37Description: Kres asked that I apply Timue's salve to him, given that he can't do it himself.
Toast: Kres seeks to right a wrong of his past.
